name: Zero to Hero
description: This mon has the potential to become a true HERO! But it also takes a second... Hey! Fashion is important!
effect: Can not be activated Round 1. User must leave the battle for one whole round, after which they return as Palfin 'Hero Form'. Ability unlocks after Level 6. This Ability cannot be swapped, copied, replaced or nullified (ignoring the effects of Skill Swap, Worry Seed, Gastro Acid, Trace etc.)
